title: Bad Cat - Granny's Return
description: Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!
